thread.title: 2018 World Cup: Ghana to face Comoros in first round qualifier after with shock wins
thread.title_full: 2018 World Cup: Ghana to face Comoros in first round qualifier after with shock wins

title: 2018 World Cup: Ghana to face Comoros in first round qualifier after with shock wins
text:
Sports News | 14 October 2015 03:55 CET 2018 World Cup: Ghana to face Comoros in first round qualifier after with shock wins - www.ghanasoccernet.com 
Ghana will play the Comoros Islands in the the first round of the 2018 World Cup qualifiers next month after the tiny country secured a shock victory over highly-fancied Lesotho on Tuesday. 
Comoros earned an important away draw on Tuesday to progress to the next round of 2018 World Cup qualifying. 
For more Ghana football news visit www.ghanasoccernet.com
